title: SELECTED SHORTS: CELEBRATING 50 YEARS OF STEPHEN KING WITH HOST COLSON WHITEHEAD (SPONSORED)
description: Master storyteller and bestselling author Stephen King burst onto the literary scene in 1974 with the publication of the spine-chilling novel Carrie. Come see actors and admirers pay tribute to the legendary author with readings from his sensational short fiction––and an excerpt from the book that launched an extraordinary writing career. Hosted by Colson Whitehead (Harlem Shuffle), with performances by Carrie Coon (The Gilded Age), John Benjamin Hickey (Salem’s Lot), David Morse (The Green Mile), and Heather Alicia Simms (Luke Cage).
cost: $15 with code: King (limited tickets at this price)
